ZYSH SIGMET 4 VALID 081300/081700 ZYTX-
ZYSH SHENYANG FIR EMBD TS FCST
S OF LINE N5030 E11912 - N5100 E12656 AND
NW OF LINE N4743 E13128 - N4402 E12343 AND
NE OF LINE N4402 E12343 - N4614 E11632 TOP FL300 MOV NE 20KMH INTSF
 ==

WSUS33 KKCI 081255 
SIGW  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET...NONE 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 081455-081855 
TS ARE NOT EXPD TO REQUIRE WST ISSUANCES.
==

WSUS31 KKCI 081255 
SIGE  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 15E 
VALID UNTIL 1455Z 
FL GA AND CSTL WTRS 
FROM 60NNE CRG-50E OMN-40SSW CRG-40S CTY-60SW AMG-60NNE CRG 
AREA TS MOV FROM 19010KT. TOPS TO FL400. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 081455-081855 
FROM HMV-FLO-140ESE ILM-140SSE ILM-70ENE PBI-100SE MIA-70W 
EYW-90WSW PIE-170S CEW-BNA-HMV 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
==

SIGC

VALID UNTIL 1455Z

FROM 50NNW IGB-40SE IGB-50ESE MEI-40NNW AEX-40SSW LIT-50NNW IGB

11035KT.

AREA 1...FROM 50S YWG-INL-80WSW YQT-MSP-FSD-40WSW RAP-50N ISN-50S 
YWG
